product_name: MaybellineSuper Stay 24H Skin Tint + Vitamin C
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGive BackTurn up your skin with Maybelline's Super Stay 24H Skin Tint + Vitamin C. This longwear skin tint delivers skin-like coverage and a natural, radiant finish while resisting sweat, humidity and fading.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers bright, buildable light-to-medium coverage for a skin-like finish and a natural, radiant lookWeightless feel, up to 24HR wearResists sweat, humidity & fadingVitamin C infused formula brightens skin instantly & over timeMade for everyday use for a bright, fresh lookDermatologist tested for safety; non-comedogenic & suitable for sensitive skinItem 2610824How To UseShake bottle well, apply a few drops with fingers or beauty blender to blend into skin. Apply more product to build to medium coverage. Can be worn alone or layered with other makeup/skincare products.Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected, or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetics eye applicators can lead to eye damage and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not use near fire, flame, or heat.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tin Oxide, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Dipentaerythrityl Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Silica, Silica Silylate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Cellulose, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain (+/-): Mica, Ci 77007/Ultramarines, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide. Fil T70018127/1Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake bottle well, apply a few drops with fingers or beauty blender to blend into skin. Apply more product to build to medium coverage. Can be worn alone or layered with other makeup/skincare products.Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected, or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetics eye applicators can lead to eye damage and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not use near fire, flame, or heat.

reviews.headline: Long lasting wear
reviews.comments: This foundation is very long lasting and i don't have to do touch ups throughout the day. I would compare to Farmasi foundation. Full coverage a decent price.

reviews.headline: ride or die
reviews.comments: Im always trying new foundations and skin tints. I have acne prone skin and redness so i struggle finding something like a skin tint, but also has a good coverage until now. I feel like every skin tint i try is so thin, its honestly pointless but this one is fantastic. You can make it light and thin but can also build it up. I even use this on a full beat look and its fantastic. Seriously do not have one bad thing to say on it.

reviews.headline: The BEST!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for over 2 years, and I LOVE IT!

reviews.headline: big no for me
reviews.comments: i wasnt sure what shade i was so i used the shade finder. that was such a big mistake, it was way too warm toned and almost orange

reviews.headline: One of my favs
reviews.comments: This may be a con for aome since its considered a skin tint, but i absolitely love the coverage on this! Ita not thin on application like a skin tint usually is, but instead has really good coverage, without feeling cakey or thick- i got two shades so i have a winter color and summer color and i love them all. I go back ans forth between this and a standard foundation and always go right back to using this no mather the circumstances because it gives me whatever type of coverage i want. I have acne prone skin & this still covers acne with no issues for me! Probably my favorite yet!

reviews.headline: My new go to
reviews.comments: Im so pleasantly surprised by this product. Ive been using for a few months now. I have to say it is as good and in some cases better than my high end foundations. I find myself reaching for it over the others regularly. It goes on light snd yet covers in a natural gliwy finish. It diesnt settle into my fine lines. Stays beautiful all day. I am 56 and have dry skin. I'm in love!

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: This is great for my 58 year old skin. It covers but looks so natural.

reviews.headline: Bro why is this so good
reviews.comments:
This is my new favorite go to for every occasion, casual or more full glam. To me less of a skin tint more of a super thin foundation but idk if there's a word for that. It has great coverage for how light it is, more than any skin tint I own and it doesnt slip around or disappear completely with blending. With an additional dab on my redder areas I can easily layer for fuller coverage. 

I have combo skin and it works well with my dry skin on my nose and surrounding area, I only need a hydrating primer when I'm especially dry. Usually I don't use a primer with this. This actually sets down and is soft to the touch. Still dewey though. Idk this stuff is perfect. Drugstore makeup is so dumb expensive these days but this is worth it!!

reviews.headline: Obsessed ü§©
reviews.comments: This product ruined all other foundations and skin tints for me. I prefer it to my high end complexion products. The medium/buildable coverage and skin-like satin finish are perfect for my somewhat dry skin.

reviews.headline: Melts into skin
reviews.comments: I love this "foundation" so much. It blends so easily and it gives such a natural skin like look while also being able to cover up a lot of breakouts. Not big giant ones but little ones.

reviews.headline: My New Go To
reviews.comments: I've never been a skin tint girly, but my best friend recommended this. My life has forever been changed. The coverage and the glow? *chefs kiss* Run, don't walk!!

reviews.headline: Too Thick
reviews.comments: Felt to thick on face

reviews.headline: FEELS LIKE SKIN
reviews.comments: This skin tint is literally your skin but better. Still provides enough coverage that is better than many CC & BB creams but literally gets absorbed into your skin. You dont feel it or see it. You will not be disappointed last the time I am at work plus a few more hours.

reviews.headline: Great Mixer
reviews.comments: I mixed this with the Superstay Luminous Matte. I love the mixture. Very spreadable. This has pretty good coverage for a skin tint. I just wish it wasn't with a dropper. It does remind me a lot of the Ilia Skin Tint, but application and coverage. Overall, happy with this purchase.

reviews.headline: Great Summer Foundation
reviews.comments: I bought this after seeing recommendations online.  I needed a summer foundation that is lighter, and this fits the bill.  So far it is holding up to head and humidity.

reviews.headline: I understand the hype, worth it!
reviews.comments:
I saw someone on Youtube use this for their bridal makeup‚Ä¶now that I gave this "tint" a chance, I finally understand why. I have pores, acne prone, dry skin, fine lines on my forehead. I keep reaching for this, out of all the fancy expensive foundations I own, on a daily I reach for this. It feels like a light watery serum like application but with a lot of coverage. Doesn't empahsize my pores. 
I'm so glad I gave this a try, I was not expexting so much coverage. I wore it to Europe and it would not budge on long days. One tip is to use a sponge to smooth out any streaks your brush could leave. I set it with Kosas powder.

reviews.headline: It's a no for me.
reviews.comments: The formula goes on well and feels great. I don't feel like it was drying or heavy. I have oily skin and this definitely stayed put. BUT why is it so shiny?! I  didn't notice this in any of the videos that influenced me to try the product, but I feel like a vampire in Twilight. Or Selena Gomez at that one red carpet where she was unfortunately super-bronzed. The pearlescence is way too strong for me. People keep recommending it for oily skin like we don't have enough shine already‚Ä¶.

reviews.headline: Cakey and Transfers easily
reviews.comments: Did not blend well and had a cakey finish. This is probably the worst foundation I've used. I feel like lots of influencers have hyped this up, and was disappointed after trying it out. The packaging also wastes lots of product.

reviews.headline: The perfect low coverage skin tint
reviews.comments: Does a beautiful job of evening out my skin tone while still looking completely natural. It neutralizes my normal redness, but without hiding my freckles, which I love!

reviews.headline: üèÉüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüí®ü§ëü§ë
reviews.comments: so goood!!! affordable, doesnt break me out(im super duper acne prone and sensitive), great coverage (my whole face is red acne marksüòÇ), non irritating, blends like a dream, decent wear, great consistency. tho, please fix ur packaging maybellineüò≠üò≠ the dropper is so bad it doesnt work for anybody its so annoyingggg. btw be careful w ur skin prep and application as it can be patchy and not cute if u do it wrong. i found a good technique that works w it i love it.

media.headline: Great for pigment loss & natural look
media.caption: 220 + 312 mixed & faded to light/no coverage towards the center of my face

media.headline: Awesome Shade Range and the formula TopTier
media.caption: Maybelline SuperStay Skin Tint

media.headline: Shade 112 is similar to Rose Light in L'Oreal Serum
media.caption: L'Oreal True Match Serum Shade Rosy Light (1-2.5) on left and Maybelline Shade 112 on right

faceoff_positive.comments: I have pigment loss on my face due to severe eczema that was not controlled for about 4 years. My skin is medium, leaning warm, but my face is fair white as it won't visibly tan or burn in the summer. I don't really wear make up anymore, especially not foundation, and I tried to do self-tanners on my face but they either don't make a difference or fade within a day or two (shoutout to my good skincare) so I've been on the hunt to find a skin-tint that I can mix with my sunscreen or moisturized and wear for nights out or when I know there will be photos. I wore this for the first time last night at a concert to test it out. I didn't feel it on my skin at all, and it worked great. I don't have a lot of acne or texture anymore, but I do have some happiness wrinkles and this product didn't make them visible. I also went lighter towards the center of my face & could still see my freckles through which was what I wanted. It could easily give medium to medium-full coverage if you build it up. It lasted all night with no powder or other products on top. I only needed a few drops to cover my face and it blended well into my normal skintone. For reference, I picked up 220 and 312 because I wasn't sure which one I'd be right now, and the 312 was more of my summer shade, so I mixed a little of each to get the perfect color. The website won't let me post a picture but it looked great!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for pigment loss & natural look

faceoff_negative.comments: Beautiful finish and long wear but there's no way the tiny quantities of vitamin C and E (listed nearly last on the ingredient list) make up for the quantity of denatured alcohol (#4 on the list) in this formula. Denatured alcohol (AKA rubbing alcohol) IS BAD FOR SKIN. Maybelline has to know this. Please give us something better!
faceoff_negative.headline: Too much alcohol

rollup.name: Super Stay 24H Skin Tint + Vitamin C
